phrases: Under Shinichirou's shoe, there is a cockroach, too.
In Shinichirou's hat, there is a cockroach, too.
I knew it... it was useless...
If you cannot make your own decisions,
and you will not be able to laugh...
As I thought, you cannot cry if you do not decide to yourself.
I was only looking down on you, because I thought, like me, you cannot fly...
You only chose not to fly.
You hold up your head and look straight ahead.
That is the same as flying...
I think Noe will return home soon.
It did not seem like anything happened, so relax.
Pass it along to him, as well.
I was the one comparing myself to Ground.
I was the one not noticing how great Ground really is.
The one opposing everything, was me, I chose to escape from reality.
but I did not decide on anything myself.
The reason I did not want to do the dance was not because I am bad at it!
It is because I did not want to be compared to Dad!
The reason I did not draw the picture book was not because I did not feel like it!
It is because I was scared of learning my limits!
Go on and wash your hands, it will be ready soon.
Hey, do not cling to me so hard.
Let us head back in and get ourselves warmed up.
Hey, where is the young master?
He should have gotten changed by now...
I will go have a look.
He should be getting ready in your room.
Now now, do not talk such nonsense, have some more!
Try some of our local wine!
The three consecutive year award winning, Namida Sankei!
It is so delicious it will truly make you cry...
Alright, one bottle of Namida Sankei to bring with you!
Did you get any sleep after what happened?
That really scared me last night...
And you even practiced so hard for today...
The reason I could not sleep was...
Ahh, well... the lack of sleep is not a problem.
Since it will make me more alert.
I wonder where I can see you best...
I was thinking that I would like to watch Shinichirou-kun from the closest possible place during the Hounou dance.
Perhaps near the shrine office would be best?
When the festival comes, I will be at the front row looking at Shinichirou dancing!
It will be really crowded, so do not force yourself just to watch.
I am not going to the festival...
Oh, we are doing fine over here.
We have a lot of free time until the Hounou dance ends.
Sorry I had you do all the work!
Ai-chan, it is been a long time.
Hiromi-chan, you look really good in a kimono!
I wonder if she came to see Shinichirou...
Well, I guess all these are things I would not know about.
What did you say to Shinichirou-kun last night?
He said he will do everything properly.
I am sure Shinichirou-kun feels the same about me.
I know I am being selfish for what I have said,
But, we finally understand each other.
We can finally face each other honestly...
Sorry, but please leave us be.
Hey, where you off to, master?
Hey bro, the one just now was not completely cooked.
That is because we use only selected wheat!
Ai-chan went to the community center, so I am watching the store for her.
You are getting along well, are not you?
Speaking of it, what are you doing?
Should the star of the Mugiha dance really be loitering around here?
Inside Shinichirou's butt, there is a cockroach, too!
There was a call... from a printing company in Tokyo.
The boss went to watch the festival.
You can hang out here for a while.
Why did you decide that on your own?
You told me you were going to specialty school!
Why are you going to work, all of a sudden?
Remember that you locked yourself in your room after Granny died?
You did not even come out to play with your friends.
I felt that I had to protect you...
I am getting more and more confused.
I thought I only wanted to protect you, but I have done a lot of pointless stuff.
But I think I love you a bit more than that.
It is strange to have such feelings,
that is why I asked him to take care of it.
Is it really that strange to say you love me?
Did not we kiss when we were kids?
But, in return, you need to rethink about getting yourself a job.
That is probably the kind of kiss that I would want.
but being by your side... is too painful.
I did not realize onii-chan's feelings...
Nor did I realize Yuasa Hiromi's feelings...
I did not even realize how Shinichirou really feels.
Can tears really be she would...
Looks like this year's lead suddenly got better!
I am pretty sure that is Nakagami's son.
But, why all of a sudden...
He is was tempted by the red seeds,
And stood up on the cliff.
Is it because he wants to eat those red seeds?
Or is it because of this white snow?
But, that is what Raigoumaru was thinking deep within.
The only reason that I thought of drawing a picture book was...
because of those eyes... that believed I could fly.
You want to fly high in the sky.
And Raigoumaru spread his wings and flew.
The dance was great, was not it?
I told Isurugi-san not to interfere with us anymore.
It is about time for me to go.
The festival is about to end.
I wonder how the view is from the sky...
Can I see it too if I look from the sky?
I want you to see it!
I want to know what you think!
I hate how I am now.
